components.description:
Yee-haw! A yellow smiley wearing a wide-brimmed, brown-leather cowboy hat. Its smile varies across platforms. May convey a sense of exuberance, whimsy, confidence, adventure, or other sentiments.

Several vendors, including Apple, feature the same expression as their ðŸ˜ƒ Grinning Face With Big Eyes.
components.title: Face with Cowboy Hat

title: Face with Cowboy Hat

version.description:
The Unicode Consortium accepted the following emoji 72 emojis for Unicode 9.0. This update was released on June 21, 2016. Most vendors added support for this update within the 2016 calendar year. Sample images and more about Unicode 9.0.

Emoji 4.0 was published in late 2016, which added additional emoji professions.

New in Unicode 9

emoji_net_data.category: Supplemental Symbols And Pictographs -> Emoticon faces
emoji_net_data.definition: A face displayed wearing a wide-brimmed cowboy hat. Shown as a yellow smiley, with non-human appearance. Cowboy Hat Face was approved as par http://emojipedia.org/face-with-cowboy-hat/
emoji_net_data.name: cowboy hat face

bn:13609201v: To work as a cowboy, herding cattle.

bn:00089233v: Put on or wear a hat

bn:13617546v: To work as a cowgirl, herding cattle.

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00016814n: A man who herds and tends cattle on a ranch, esp. in the western U.S., and who traditionally goes about most of his work on horseback.
A cowhand (one who tends free-range cattle)
A man who tends free-range cattle, especially in the American West.
Owner or operator of a cattle business
A hired hand who tends cattle and performs other duties on horseback
An American who herds cattle on horseback
A person who herds cattle; a cowboy.
A cowboy is an animal herder who tends cattle on ranches in North America, traditionally on horseback, and often performs a multitude of other ranch-related tasks.
A cowman is a person who works specifically with cattle.

bn:00017718n: A covering for the head, often in the approximate form of a cone or a cylinder closed at its top end, and sometimes having a brim and other decoration.
An item of clothing worn on a person's head.
Headdress that protects the head from bad weather; has shaped crown and usually a brim
A hat is a head covering.
"Chapeau" is a French term signifying a hat or other covering for the head.
An item of clothing intended to cover the head made from material hard enough to have a shape independant of the skull, and most commonly with a rim.

apple_vendor_description: The cowboy hat face emoji on Apple devices is a charismatic character with a broad smile and a classic, Stetson-style cowboy hat perched jauntily on its head. Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading gives the hat and face a distinct depth and a playful, almost tangible texture.  The bright, cheerful expression and the iconic Western headwear on Appleâ€™s design evoke feelings of adventure, fun, the Wild West, or a generally positive and enthusiastic outlook.
